title: Can't find "go version" when doing "dist windows-amd64" on win2k3 64 bit
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

C:\gobuild>dist windows-amd64
2012/03/07 11:28:30 readCredentials: open .gobuildkey: The system cannot find the file
specified.
2012/03/07 11:33:15 windows-amd64:
C:\Profiles\ADMINI~1\LOCALS~1\Temp\2\bindist180057914\go\bin\go version: exec:
"C:\\Profiles\\ADMINI~1\\LOCALS~1\\Temp\\2\\bindist180057914\\go\\bin\\go":
file does not exist

C:\gobuild>

What is the expected output?

msi got generated.
